import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Member(props) { const {member} = props; return (

BASICS

{ member.firstName } { member.lastName }{ member.nickName }
Birth Day { member.dateOfBirth } - {member.age}
About { member.about }
Gender { member.gender }

PARENTS

{ member.father ? : '' } { member.mother ? : '' }
{ member.father.nickName } { member.father.firstName } { member.father.lastName } { member.father.dateOfBirth } - {member.father.age} { member.father.about } { member.father.gender }
{ member.mother.nickName } { member.mother.firstName } { member.mother.lastName } { member.mother.dateOfBirth } - {member.mother.age} { member.mother.about } { member.mother.gender }
{ member.lifePartner ?

LIFE PARTNER

{ member.lifePartner.nickName } { member.lifePartner.firstName } { member.lifePartner.lastName } { member.lifePartner.dateOfBirth } { member.lifePartner.about } { member.lifePartner.gender }
: '' } { member.children ?

CHILDREN

{member.children.map(child => ( ))}
{ child.nickName } { child.firstName } { child.lastName } { child.dateOfBirth } { child.about } { child.gender }
: '' }
) } /* ############################ */ /* ##### TR HEADER ##### */ /* ############################ */ const TRHeader = () => ( Nick Name First Name Last Name Birth Day About Gender ) export default Member;
